name: Thermonucleosis
body: Hi, you're looking at a game I made recently. I've recently begun making games in my free time, and I'm experimenting with different ways to get things out there. I'm new to GitHub, and I'm still trying things out here. I'm not sure how much I'll use it in the future, but it's been pretty interesting so far. I hope you enjoy the game.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
